title: [GAMEPLAY] Jhin - Bouncing Grenade Cancellation
body: On Jhin, firing your Bouncing Grenade (Q) and autoattacking a target (it happens more frequently with the 4th shot) will cancel the bouncing grenade bounce completely. The shot should be fired while the grenade is still mid bounce. I would say it occurs about 10 to 20% of the time.

replies.body:
Hey MasterArcanist! 

Thanks for the report! We're looking to get a fix in for this ASAP.

Riot is aware of the bug and working on it~
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/jQYaup3c-gameplay-hn-jhin-q-bounce-only-twice?comment=0001
